title: Anyone seen this one before?
content:
Looking for a name or place I could get this font from (Africa)...

[http://www.nationalgeographic.com/africa/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071216073034/http:/www.nationalgeographic.com/africa/ "http://www.nationalgeographic.com/africa/")

Thanks!

 [‹ Swat 4 Title Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071216073034/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12353 "Go to previous forum topic") [EGOR font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071216073034/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12187 "Go to next forum topic")
author: michaeljamesyork

comments.content: It may be Nat’l Geo’s own font, Michael. But you could customize something like [Nuephoric](http://web.archive.org/web/20071216073034/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FT.118684.0.0) and get close.
